mapper.select: select count(p_num) as p_cnt from purchase where p_buydate >= (select to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD') from dual)
select count(rf_num) from refund_view where pd_orderstate!='rfconfirm' and rf_confirmdate>=(select to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD') from dual)

select sum(pd_price) from (select pdetail.pd_price, purchase.p_buydate from purchase inner join pdetail on pdetail.c_num=purchase.c_num and purchase.p_num=pdetail.p_num where trunc(p_buydate) = to_date(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') and pdetail.pd_orderstate='confirm')
select count(re_num) from review where trunc(re_writedate) = to_date(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
select count(q_num) from qna where trunc(q_writedate) = TO_DATE(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
